show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
On Todayâ€™s Connect the Dots, PRN host, green health journalist, and Huffington reporter Alison Rose Levy... <!--more--> (www.healthjournalistblog.
com and @alisonroselevy) will feature two leading activists.
In the first half of the program, Alison will speak with Angela Monti Fox ( http://www.mothersforsustainableenergy.
com/) the Founder of The Mothers Project Educational Forum, and in the second half, Kristen Hayes, a Pennsylvania mother raising awareness about toxins and health.
